Name: Parsley
SeedDescription: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en primavera. Tardan 4 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Frühling. Wächst in 4 Tagen heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter au printemps. Prend 4 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket tavasszal ültesd el. 4 napig tart megnőniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 春植えの作物。そだつのに4日かかる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as na primavera. Demora 4 dias para amadurecer.
